title: Surviving The Fourth Natural Disaster - Novel Updates
tags: Automatons   Bloodlines   Caring Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Dolls/Puppets   Dwarfs   Elemental Magic   Elves   Game Elements   Goddesses   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Proactive Protagonist   Reincarnation
author: 纳西利亚
description: The civil engineer from ‘earth’ thought he had reincarnated in the magical continent and tragically became a wood, earth, and water warlock. When he was still wondering where the blood of the Earth Bear came from, the prince next door summoned the players. Looking at it, Hill just wanted to hide well.>
